page.title: 20Domesday Project - Melanie
page.content: I enjoyed taking part in this Project. We went on many visits. The best was to{Towerlands Equestrian {Centre.}Several ladies from the {Shalford Womens Institute}and some mums took us, in their cars, on the visits. We took with us tape recorder and cameras. We met many interesting and helpful people. After the visits we wrote about them - which was not much fun! We made models, did paintings, spinning and clay work and made mobiles. At the end of term we had an exhibition of all our work. Our parents, people who had helped us in various ways, local residents and a newspaper reporter came. A photo and report was printed in the{Essex {Chronicle.}The{Technical Officer}from the{Telephone Exchange}gave two prizes for the best work about the Exchange.
